Back_Alley_Power_Punch.display_help: A Power Punch attack that knocks opponents down.
Back_Alley_Power_Punch.display_short_help: PBAoE Melee, High DMG(Smash/Energy), Foe Knockback

Punch.display_help: A Super Strength Punch is a powerful pummeling attack, and it may knocks foes off their feet.
Punch.display_target_help: A Super Strength Punch is a powerful pummeling attack, and it may knocks foes off their feet.

Knockout_Blow.display_help: Back Alley Brawler has hit you with a Knockout Blow. You are Held.
Knockout_Blow.display_target_help: Back Alley Brawler has hit you with a Knockout Blow. You are Held.

Hurl.display_help: You are able to tear up a chunk of ground beneath your feet and Hurl it at an enemy. This attack is close ranged, deals moderate damage, and can knock foes back. Damage: Heavy, Recharge: Moderate
Hurl.display_target_help: You are able to tear up a chunk of ground beneath your feet and Hurl it at an enemy. This attack is close ranged, deals moderate damage, and can knock foes back. Damage: Heavy, Recharge: Moderate

Foot_Stomp.display_help: Back Alley Brawler can use their superior leg strength to stomp the ground, quaking the earth itself. This is a localized attack against everything in melee range.
Foot_Stomp.display_target_help: Back Alley Brawler can use their superior leg strength to stomp the ground, quaking the earth itself. This is a localized attack against everything in melee range.

Total_Focus.display_help: Total Focus is complete mastery over Energy Melee. This is a very slow, but incredibly devastating attack that can knock out most opponents, leaving them Disoriented. Due to the exhausting nature of Total Focus, recharge time is very long. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Long

Dull_Pain.display_help: Back Alley Brawler can activate this power to increase his maximum Hit Points for a short time.
Dull_Pain.display_target_help: Back Alley Brawler can activate this power to increase his maximum Hit Points for a short time.

Unyielding.display_help: When you toggle on this power, you become Unyielding. You are resistant to Knockback, Sleep, Hold, Immobilize, Disorient effects, and Smashing, Lethal, Fire, Cold, Energy, Negative Energy and Toxic damage.
Unyielding.display_short_help: Toggle: Self +Res(Knockback, Sleep, Disorient, Hold, Immobilize, Smashing, Lethal Fire, Cold, Energy, Negative Energy, Toxic)

Assault.display_help: While this power is active, you and your nearby teammates deal more damage.
Assault.display_target_help: Your attack damage is improved due to good leadership and teamwork.
Assault.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} increases your team's damage potential

Unstoppable.display_help: When you activate this power, you not only become extremely resistant to most damage, but also to Disorient, Immobilization, Hold, and Sleep effects. Endurance recovery is also increased. Unstoppable costs little Endurance to activate, but when it wears o
Unstoppable.display_short_help: Self, +Res(Disorient, Sleep, Hold, Immobilize, All DMG but Psionics)
Unstoppable.display_target_short_help: Self, +Res(Disorient, Sleep, Hold, Immobilize, All DMG but Psionics)

Super_Leap.display_help: Back Alley Brawler can Leap to building tops without problem.
Super_Leap.display_target_help: Back Alley Brawler can Leap to building tops without problem.

Back_Alley_Power_Punch.display_help: A Power Punch attack that knocks opponents down.
Back_Alley_Power_Punch.display_short_help: PBAoE Melee, High DMG(Smash/Energy), Foe Knockback

Dull_Pain.display_target_help: Back Alley Brawler can activate this power to increase his maximum Hit Points for a short time.

Unyielding.display_help: When you toggle on this power, you become Unyielding. You are resistant to Knockback, Sleep, Hold, Immobilize, Disorient effects, and Smashing, Lethal, Fire, Cold, Energy, Negative Energy and Toxic damage.
Unyielding.display_short_help: Toggle: Self +Res(Knockback, Sleep, Disorient, Hold, Immobilize, Smashing, Lethal Fire, Cold, Energy, Negative Energy, Toxic)

Assault.display_help: While this power is active, you and your nearby teammates deal more damage.
Assault.display_target_help: Your attack damage is improved due to good leadership and teamwork.
Assault.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} increases your team's damage potential

Unstoppable.display_short_help: Self, +Res(Disorient, Sleep, Hold, Immobilize, All DMG but Psionics)
Unstoppable.display_target_short_help: Self, +Res(Disorient, Sleep, Hold, Immobilize, All DMG but Psionics)

Super_Leap.display_target_help: Back Alley Brawler can Leap to building tops without problem.

Back_Alley_Power_Punch.display_short_help: PBAoE Melee, High DMG(Smash/Energy), Foe Knockback

Knockout_Blow.display_help: Back Alley Brawler has hit you with a Knockout Blow. You are Held.
Knockout_Blow.display_target_help: Back Alley Brawler has hit you with a Knockout Blow. You are Held.

Hurl.display_help: You are able to tear up a chunk of ground beneath your feet and Hurl it at an enemy. This attack is close ranged, deals moderate damage, and can knock foes back. Damage: Heavy, Recharge: Moderate
Hurl.display_target_help: You are able to tear up a chunk of ground beneath your feet and Hurl it at an enemy. This attack is close ranged, deals moderate damage, and can knock foes back. Damage: Heavy, Recharge: Moderate

Foot_Stomp.display_help: Back Alley Brawler can use their superior leg strength to stomp the ground, quaking the earth itself. This is a localized attack against everything in melee range.
Foot_Stomp.display_target_help: Back Alley Brawler can use their superior leg strength to stomp the ground, quaking the earth itself. This is a localized attack against everything in melee range.

Total_Focus.display_help: Total Focus is complete mastery over Energy Melee. This is a very slow, but incredibly devastating attack that can knock out most opponents, leaving them Disoriented. Due to the exhausting nature of Total Focus, recharge time is very long. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Long

Dull_Pain.display_help: Back Alley Brawler can activate this power to increase his maximum Hit Points for a short time.
Dull_Pain.display_target_help: Back Alley Brawler can activate this power to increase his maximum Hit Points for a short time.

Super_Leap.display_help: Back Alley Brawler can Leap to building tops without problem.
Super_Leap.display_target_help: Back Alley Brawler can Leap to building tops without problem.

Barrage.display_help: A Barrage from the Hero has Disoriented you.
Barrage.display_target_help: A Barrage from the Hero has Disoriented you.

Energy_Punch.display_help: An Energy Punch from the Hero has Disoriented you.
Energy_Punch.display_target_help: An Energy Punch from the Hero has Disoriented you.

Whirling_Hands.display_help: A Whirling Hands attack from the Hero has Disoriented you.
Whirling_Hands.display_target_help: A Whirling Hands attack from the Hero has Disoriented you.

Energy_Transfer.display_help: Mastery of Energy Melee begins with the ability to transfer your own Hit Points into a punch that deals extreme damage. Energy Transfer has a good chance of Disorienting the target. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow
Energy_Transfer.display_short_help: Melee, Extreme DMG(Energy/Smash), Foe Disorient, Knockback

Power_Burst.display_help: A short range, but devastating attack. Damage: Heavy, Recharge: Slow
Power_Burst.display_target_help: A short range, but devastating attack. Damage: Heavy, Recharge: Slow

Explosive_Blast.display_help: Hurls a blast of charged energy that violently explodes on impact, damaging all foes near the target.
Explosive_Blast.display_target_help: Hurls a blast of charged energy that violently explodes on impact, damaging all foes near the target.

Energy_Torrent.display_help: Unleashes a cone of energy that knocks foes back.
Energy_Torrent.display_target_help: Unleashes a cone of energy that knocks foes back.

Overload.display_help: You can Overload your Energy Aura and dramatically improve your defense to all attack types except Psionic Attacks. Overload also grants you high resistance to Defense Debuffs. This Energy Aura is so powerful, that it can even absorb some damage, effectively increasing your Max Hit Points, However, when Overload wears off, you are left drained of all Endurance and unable to Recover Endurance for a while. Recharge: Very Long
Overload.display_short_help: Self +DEF(All but Psionics), +Recovery, +Max HP, Res(DeBuff DEF), +Special

Nova.display_help: You can explode in a tremendous blast of energy, sending nearby foes flying. The Nova deals massive damage to all nearby foes, although the damage does vary. Activating this power leaves you drained of Endurance, and unable to recover any Endurance for a while. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Very Long
Nova.display_short_help: PBAoE, Extreme DMG(Energy/Smash), Foe Knockback, Self -Recovery

Entropy_Shield.display_help: Your Defense to Smashing, Lethal, Cold, Fire, Energy, and Negative Energy attacks is increased. The shield also makes you resistant to Knockback, Repel, Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Immobilization, Defense Debuffs and enemy Teleportation for as long as you can keep this toggle power active.
Entropy_Shield.display_short_help: Toggle: Self +DEF(Smashing, Lethal, Fire, Cold, Energy, Negative), +Res(Knockback, Repel, Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Immobilize, Teleport, DeBuff DEF

Fistful_of_Arrows.display_help: You fire a fistful of arrows at foes in a cone in front of you. Good at close range. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

Blazing_Arrow.display_help: You fire a Blazing Arrow at your foe, dealing some Lethal damage and causing him to catch on fire and burn. Slightly less accurate than other Archery attacks. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow

Explosive_Arrow.display_help: You fire a grenade-tipped arrow at long range. This explosion affects all within the blast radius, and can knock them back. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

Stunning_Shot.display_help: You fire a blunt, weighted arrow at your target's chest. The Stunning Shot has a good chance of stunning your foe. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Slow

Rain_of_Arrows.display_help: You unleash a Rain of Arrows on a targeted location, damaging foes within a large area. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Long

Entangling_Arrow.display_help: Upon impact, the Entangling Arrow releases a strong net that can Immobilize most targets. This non-lethal device deals no damage and does not prevent targets from attacking, although their attack rate is Slowed. The Entangling Arrow can bring down flying entities and halts jumping. Recharge: Fast
Entangling_Arrow.display_target_help: You have been caught in a net. You cannot move or fly and your attack speed is reduced.

Ice_Arrow.display_help: This arrow can freeze a single foe in a block of ice. The target is frozen solid, helpless, and can be attacked. More powerful foes may not be Held, but all affected targets will be Slowed. Recharge: Moderate
Ice_Arrow.display_target_help: You are frozen in a Block of Ice. Once free, your Attack Rate and Running speed will be reduced slightly for a while.

Poison_Gas_Arrow.display_help: This arrow carries a capsule cloud of poisonous gas, which explodes on impact and weakens all foes in its vicinity. Affected foes damage potential will be severely reduced. Some foes will react badly to the poison and choke for a time. Recharge: Slow

Acid_Arrow.display_help: This arrow explodes in a small shower of acid on impact. This acid eats through armor, causing damage over time. It reduces the target's Defense as well as his Damage Resistance. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Slow
Acid_Arrow.display_target_help: Your Resistances and Defense have been weakened by the Acid Arrow.
Acid_Arrow.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with an Acid Arrow. The acid is burning you and reducing your damage resistance.

EMP_Arrow.display_help: This arrow can unleash a massive pulse of electromagnetic energy on impact. This EMP can affect machines, and is even powerful enough to affect synaptic brain patterns. It will incapacitate all foes in its radius. Additionally, most machines and robots will take moderate high damage. However, this power uses a lot of Endurance and leaves you unable to recover Endurance for a while. Recharge: Very Long
EMP_Arrow.display_short_help: AoE, Foe Hold, Special vs. Robots, Self -Recovery
EMP_Arrow.display_target_help: You are held immobile by the EMP Pulse and your Regeneration Rate is reduced.

Teleport_Arrow.display_help: Manticore has the ability to teleport an arrow directly to his target.
Teleport_Arrow.display_target_help: Though it takes longer to execute, your Aimed Shot deals greater damage than the Talon Snap Shot. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

Stealth.display_help: The Cloaking Device allows you to use an LCD body coating become partially invisible. While Cloaked you can only be seen at very close range. If you attack while Cloaked, you will be discovered. Even if discovered, you are hard to see and have a bonus to Defense. Unlike some stealth powers, the Cloaking Device has no movement penalty. Recharge: Slow
Stealth.display_target_help: The Cloaking Device allows you to use an LCD body coating become partially invisible. While Cloaked you can only be seen at very close range. If you attack while Cloaked, you will be discovered. Even if discovered, you are hard to see and have a bonus to Defense. Unlike some stealth powers, the Cloaking Device has no movement penalty. Recharge: Slow

Teleport.display_help: Manticore has hacked into Paragon Cities Emergency Teleportation system and can use it to travel.
Teleport.display_target_help: Manticore has hacked into Paragon Cities Emergency Teleportation system and can use it to travel.

Maneuvers.display_help: Good leaders are rare. These powers can grant bonuses to your and your teammates.
Maneuvers.display_short_help: PBAoE, Team +DEF(All), +DMG, Res(Taunt, Placate), +ACC, Res(Confuse, Fear), +Perception

Fistful_of_Arrows.display_help: You fire a fistful of arrows at foes in a cone in front of you. Good at close range. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

Blazing_Arrow.display_help: You fire a Blazing Arrow at your foe, dealing some Lethal damage and causing him to catch on fire and burn. Slightly less accurate than other Archery attacks. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow

Teleport_Arrow.display_target_help: Though it takes longer to execute, your Aimed Shot deals greater damage than the Talon Snap Shot. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

If you attack while Cloaked, you will be discovered. Even if discovered, you are hard to see and have a bonus to Defense. Unlike some stealth powers, the Cloaking Device has no movement penalty. Recharge: Slow
Stealth.display_target_help: The Cloaking Device allows you to use an LCD body coating become partially invisible. While Cloaked you can only be seen at very close range. If you attack while Cloaked, you will be discovered. Even if discovered, you are hard to see and have a bonus to Defense. Unlike some stealth powers, the Cloaking Device has no movement penalty. Recharge: Slow

Teleport.display_help: Manticore has hacked into Paragon Cities Emergency Teleportation system and can use it to travel.
Teleport.display_target_help: Manticore has hacked into Paragon Cities Emergency Teleportation system and can use it to travel.

Maneuvers.display_help: Good leaders are rare. These powers can grant bonuses to your and your teammates.
Maneuvers.display_short_help: PBAoE, Team +DEF(All), +DMG, Res(Taunt, Placate), +ACC, Res(Confuse, Fear), +Perception

Levitate.display_help: You can send a single target violently into the air, then slam him to the ground for Smashing damage. This power can bring flying foes to the ground. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Levitate.display_target_help: You can send a single target violently into the air, then slam him to the ground for Smashing damage. This power can bring flying foes to the ground. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

Dominate.display_help: Psychic energy tears at your mind rendering you helpless, lost in your own mind and unable to defend yourself.
Dominate.display_target_help: Psychic energy tears at your mind rendering you helpless, lost in your own mind and unable to defend yourself.

Total_Domination.display_help: This powerful attack deals Psionic damage, and is so painful it usually renders its target unconscious. The victim is asleep, and will wake if disturbed. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow

Telekinetic_Blast.display_help: You can use Telekinesis to Blast a targeted foe with the power of your mind. This attack deals Smashing and Psionic damage, and can knock your opponent back. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

Will_Domination.display_help: This powerful attack deals Psionic damage, and is so painful it usually renders its target unconscious. The victim is asleep, and will wake if disturbed. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow

Psionic_Tornado.display_help: The Hero's Psionic Tornado continues to tear at your mind and slows your attack rate!
Psionic_Tornado.display_target_help: The Hero's Psionic Tornado continues to tear at your mind and slows your attack rate!

Psychic_Wail.display_help: Psychic Wail is a devastating Psionic attack that wracks the minds of all nearby foes. Those that survive will have a severely reduced attack rate and may be left Disoriented.
Psychic_Wail.display_target_help: The Psychic Wail has reduced your attack rate.

Heal_Other.display_help: Heals a single targeted ally. You cannot use this power to heal yourself. Recharge: Fast

Fortitude.display_help: Heroes can greatly increase an ally's powers as well as increase their perception and resistances.
Fortitude.display_short_help: Ally +DEF, +DMG, +ACC, +Res(Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Immobilize, Fear, Confuse), +Perception
Fortitude.display_target_help: Heroes can greatly increase an ally's powers as well as increase their perception and resistances.
Fortitude.display_target_short_help: Ally +DEF, +DMG, +ACC, +Res(Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Immobilize, Fear, Confuse), +Perception

Adrenalin_Boost.display_help: Dramatically increases an ally's Endurance Recovery, Hit Point Regeneration and attack rate for 90 seconds. Also grants the target high resistance to slow effects. Recharge: Very Long
Adrenalin_Boost.display_target_help: The Adrenalin Boost has stimulated your system. Your Endurance recovery, Healing rate and Attack speeds are all increased and you are resistant to slow effects.
Adrenalin_Boost.display_attacker_hit: You empower {PlayerDest} with dramatically increased Endurance Recovery, Hit Point Regeneration and attack rate.
Adrenalin_Boost.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} empowers you with dramatically increased Endurance Recovery, Hit Point Regeneration and attack rate.

Ethereal.display_help: You can Phase Shift to become out of sync with normal space. Although you do not become completely Invisible, you are translucent and hard to see. You are intangible, and cannot be affected by those in normal space.

Psionic_Blast.display_help: You fire a psionic burst at the target, causing damage and increasing recharge time.
Psionic_Blast.display_target_help: Your recharge rate has been reduced!

Psionic_Crush.display_help: You imprison your target in a field of collapsing psionic energy. They are held in place and suffer continuous damage and endurance loss.
Psionic_Crush.display_target_help: You are suffering psionic damage over time and losing endurance!

Psionic_Torment.display_help: You create painful visions within the mind of your target, and these visions manifest as bleeding wounds. When the visions end, the targets suffer reduced regeneration, recovery and recharge rate.
Psionic_Torment.display_target_help: You are suffering lethal damage and endurance loss over time. Additionally, your regeneration, recovery and recharge rate have been reduced.

Psionic_Drift.display_help: You induce a dream state in all nearby targets around you while also dealing continuous psionic damage. These dreams can manifest as nightmares, lucid dreams or deep sleep, which manifest as fear, confusion or stun.
Psionic_Drift.display_short_help: PBAoE, High DMG (Psionic), Minor DoT (Psionic), Stun/Fear/Confuse(Foe)
Psionic_Drift.display_target_help: You are suffering psionic damage over time and are either feared, confused or stunned.

Psionic_Pulse.display_help: You unleash a powerful psionic shockwave that ripples through the air around you, dealing Psionic and Smashing damage to any hit by the wave. The shockwave also has a chance to knockback its targets.
Psionic_Pulse.display_target_help: You are knocked off your feet!

Psionic_Blade.display_help: You create a blade of crystalline psionic energy around your hand and use it to stab your target with a quick attack. The target suffers psionic damage, followed by a bleeding wound and reduced defense.
Psionic_Blade.display_short_help: Melee, Moderate DMG(Psionic), Moderate DoT (Lethal), -Def(Foe, All)

Psionic_Thrust.display_help: You create a blade of crystalline psionic energy around your hand and viciously stab your target. The target suffers psionic damage, followed by a bleeding wound and reduced resistance to further psionic damage.
Psionic_Thrust.display_short_help: Melee, High DMG (Psionic), Moderate DoT (Lethal), -Res(Foe, Psionic)
Psionic_Thrust.display_target_help: You are bleeding and suffering from reduced resistance to psionic damage.

Psionic_Nexus.display_help: You create a a nexus of psionic energy at your location.

Impenetrable_Mind.display_help: You are naturally protected from psionic damage, gaining a boost to your psionic resistance and defense.
Impenetrable_Mind.display_target_help: You are naturally protected from psionic damage, gaining a boost to your psionic resistance and defense.

Psionic_Blast.display_help: You fire a psionic burst at the target, causing damage and increasing recharge time.
Psionic_Blast.display_target_help: Your recharge rate has been reduced!

Psionic_Crush.display_help: You imprison your target in a field of collapsing psionic energy. They are held in place and suffer continuous damage and endurance loss.
Psionic_Crush.display_target_help: You are suffering psionic damage over time and losing endurance!

Psionic_Torment.display_help: You create painful visions within the mind of your target, and these visions manifest as bleeding wounds. When the visions end, the targets suffer reduced regeneration, recovery and recharge rate.
Psionic_Torment.display_target_help: You are suffering lethal damage and endurance loss over time. Additionally, your regeneration, recovery and recharge rate have been reduced.

Psionic_Drift.display_help: You induce a dream state in all nearby targets around you while also dealing continuous psionic damage. These dreams can manifest as nightmares, lucid dreams or deep sleep, which manifest as fear, confusion or stun.
Psionic_Drift.display_short_help: PBAoE, High DMG (Psionic), Minor DoT (Psionic), Stun/Fear/Confuse(Foe)
Psionic_Drift.display_target_help: You are suffering psionic damage over time and are either feared, confused or stunned.

Psionic_Pulse.display_help: You unleash a powerful psionic shockwave that ripples through the air around you, dealing Psionic and Smashing damage to any hit by the wave. The shockwave also has a chance to knockback its targets.
Psionic_Pulse.display_target_help: You are knocked off your feet!

Psionic_Blade.display_help: You create a blade of crystalline psionic energy around your hand and use it to stab your target with a quick attack. The target suffers psionic damage, followed by a bleeding wound and reduced defense.
Psionic_Blade.display_short_help: Melee, Moderate DMG(Psionic), Moderate DoT (Lethal), -Def(Foe, All)

Psionic_Thrust.display_help: You create a blade of crystalline psionic energy around your hand and viciously stab your target. The target suffers psionic damage, followed by a bleeding wound and reduced resistance to further psionic damage.
Psionic_Thrust.display_short_help: Melee, High DMG (Psionic), Moderate DoT (Lethal), -Res(Foe, Psionic)
Psionic_Thrust.display_target_help: You are bleeding and suffering from reduced resistance to psionic damage.

Psionic_Nexus.display_help: You create a a nexus of psionic energy at your location.

Impenetrable_Mind.display_help: You are naturally protected from psionic damage, gaining a boost to your psionic resistance and defense.
Impenetrable_Mind.display_target_help: You are naturally protected from psionic damage, gaining a boost to your psionic resistance and defense.

Neutrino_Bolt.display_help: A very quick, but low damage attack. Neutrino Blast can reduce the target's Defense. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Fast
Neutrino_Bolt.display_target_help: Your Defense has been reduced by the Neutrino Bolt.

Irradiate.display_help: You can emit lethal amounts of radiation in all directions, damaging all nearby foes for a short time. Like other Radiation attacks, this power can bypass some of a target's defenses. Irradiate severely reduces the target's Defense. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow
Irradiate.display_target_help: You are irradiated and taking damage over time. Your Defense has been reduced.

Electron_Haze.display_help: A short range conical blast of free electrons. This attack can bypass some of a target's defenses and reduce the target's Defense. It can also knock some targets down. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Electron_Haze.display_target_help: The Electron Haze has reduced your Defenses.

Cosmic_Burst.display_help: Cosmic Burst smashes the target with cosmic particles. The attack is very short range, but the damage is devastating and can leave most targets Disoriented and with reduced Defense. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow
Cosmic_Burst.display_target_help: You are disoriented and your Defenses are reduced.

Neutron_Bomb.display_help: This devastating attack lobs an explosive sphere of deadly radiation, damaging the target and all nearby foes. Neutron Bomb can bypass some of a target's defenses and reduce the target's Defense. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Neutron_Bomb.display_target_help: The Neutron Bomb has reduced your Defenses.

Atomic_Blast.display_help: The Hero has reduced your Defense and left you helpless with an Atomic Blast.
Atomic_Blast.display_target_help: The Hero has reduced your Defense and left you helpless with an Atomic Blast.

Enervating__Field.display_help: You have been exposed to an Enervating Field of radiation. Your damage and damage resistance are reduced.
Enervating__Field.display_target_help: You have been exposed to an Enervating Field of radiation. Your damage and damage resistance are reduced.
Enervating__Field.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} reduced the damage potential of all nearby foes.

Lingering_Radiation.display_help: You can emit Lingering Radiation that reduces the attack rate, movement speed, and Regeneration rate of the target, and all nearby foes. Recharge: Slow
Lingering_Radiation.display_target_help: Your Attack rate, Running speed, and Regeneration rate have been reduced by the Lingering Radiation.

Choking_Cloud.display_help: While active, you generate toxic radioactive gas around yourself. Any nearby foes may be overcome by the gas, leaving them choking and helpless. Recharge: Long
Choking_Cloud.display_target_help: You are caught in a Choking Cloud.

EM_Pulse.display_help: You are Held by the EM Pulse and your Regeneration Rate is reduced.

Overcharge.display_help: You can Overload your Energy Aura and dramatically improve your defense to all attack types except Psionic Attacks. Overload also grants you high resistance to Defense Debuffs. This Energy Aura is so powerful, that it can even absorb some damage, effectively increasing your Max Hit Points, However, when Overload wears off, you are left drained of all Endurance and unable to Recover Endurance for a while. Recharge: Very Long
Overcharge.display_short_help: Self +DEF(All but Psionics), +Recovery, +Max HP, Res(DeBuff DEF), +Special

Neutrino_Bolt.display_help: A very quick, but low damage attack. Neutrino Blast can reduce the target's Defense. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Fast
Neutrino_Bolt.display_target_help: Your Defense has been reduced by the Neutrino Bolt.

Irradiate.display_help: You can emit lethal amounts of radiation in all directions, damaging all nearby foes for a short time. Like other Radiation attacks, this power can bypass some of a target's defenses. Irradiate severely reduces the target's Defense. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow
Irradiate.display_target_help: You are irradiated and taking damage over time. Your Defense has been reduced.

Electron_Haze.display_target_help: The Electron Haze has reduced your Defenses.

Cosmic_Burst.display_target_help: You are disoriented and your Defenses are reduced.

Neutron_Bomb.display_target_help: The Neutron Bomb has reduced your Defenses.

Atomic_Blast.display_target_help: The Hero has reduced your Defense and left you helpless with an Atomic Blast.

Enervating__Field.display_target_help: You have been exposed to an Enervating Field of radiation. Your damage and damage resistance are reduced.
Enervating__Field.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} reduced the damage potential of all nearby foes.

Lingering_Radiation.display_target_help: Your Attack rate, Running speed, and Regeneration rate have been reduced by the Lingering Radiation.

Choking_Cloud.display_target_help: You are caught in a Choking Cloud.

EM_Pulse.display_help: You are Held by the EM Pulse and your Regeneration Rate is reduced.

Overcharge.display_help: You can Overload your Energy Aura and dramatically improve your defense to all attack types except Psionic Attacks. Overload also grants you high resistance to Defense Debuffs. This Energy Aura is so powerful, that it can even absorb some damage, effectively increasing your Max Hit Points, However, when Overload wears off, you are left drained of all Endurance and unable to Recover Endurance for a while. Recharge: Very Long
Overcharge.display_short_help: Self +DEF(All but Psionics), +Recovery, +Max HP, Res(DeBuff DEF), +Special

Psionic_Lightning.display_help: You cause a bolt of psionic energy to strike your foe, dealing heavy damage. These bolts also have a chance to drain the enemy's endurance.

Psionic_Tornado.display_help: You unleash a whirling vortex of psionic energy at your target, causing the target and those near them to be afflicted with moderate damage over time. Additionally, all affected targets are knocked into the air and suffer reduced recharge rate.
Psionic_Tornado.display_target_help: You are suffering psionic damage over time and reduced recharge rate!

Psionic_Link_Charging.display_help: You are establishing a psionic link to your creator.
Psionic_Link_Charging.display_target_help: You are establishing a psionic link to your creator.

Psionic_Link_Grant.display_help: You are establishing a psionic link to your creator.
Psionic_Link_Grant.display_target_help: You are establishing a psionic link to your creator.

Psionic_Link.display_help: You have established a link to your creator, allowing you to exchange energy between each other. This causes healing for both entities.

Psionic_Link_Self.display_help: You have established a link to your creator, allowing you to exchange energy between each other. This causes healing for both entities.

Psionic_Lightning.display_help: You cause a bolt of psionic energy to strike your foe, dealing heavy damage. These bolts also have a chance to drain the enemy's endurance.

Psionic_Tornado.display_help: You unleash a whirling vortex of psionic energy at your target, causing the target and those near them to be afflicted with moderate damage over time. Additionally, all affected targets are knocked into the air and suffer reduced recharge rate.
Psionic_Tornado.display_target_help: You are suffering psionic damage over time and reduced recharge rate!

Psionic_Link_Charging.display_help: You are establishing a psionic link to your creator.
Psionic_Link_Charging.display_target_help: You are establishing a psionic link to your creator.

Psionic_Link_Grant.display_help: You are establishing a psionic link to your creator.
Psionic_Link_Grant.display_target_help: You are establishing a psionic link to your creator.

Psionic_Link.display_help: You have established a link to your creator, allowing you to exchange energy between each other. This causes healing for both entities.

Psionic_Link_Self.display_help: You have established a link to your creator, allowing you to exchange energy between each other. This causes healing for both entities.

Mesmerize.display_help: Mesmerize painfully assails a target with psychic energy, rendering him unconscious. The target will remain asleep for some time, but will awaken if attacked. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Mesmerize.display_target_help: You have been Mesmerized and cannot act.

Levitate.display_help: You can send a single target violently into the air, then slam him to the ground for Smashing damage. This power can bring flying foes to the ground. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Levitate.display_target_help: You can send a single target violently into the air, then slam him to the ground for Smashing damage. This power can bring flying foes to the ground. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

Dominate.display_help: Psychic energy tears at your mind rendering you helpless, lost in your own mind and unable to defend yourself.
Dominate.display_target_help: Psychic energy tears at your mind rendering you helpless, lost in your own mind and unable to defend yourself.

Mass_Hypnosis.display_help: The Hero has hypnotized you. You are helpless for a while, unless something snaps you out of it.
Mass_Hypnosis.display_target_help: The Hero has hypnotized you. You are helpless for a while, unless something snaps you out of it.

Total_Domination.display_help: This powerful attack deals Psionic damage, and is so painful it usually renders its target unconscious. The victim is asleep, and will wake if disturbed. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow

Psychic_Shockwave.display_help: Psychic Shockwave is a devastating Psionic attack that wracks the minds of all nearby foes. Affected foes may have a reduced attack rate and may be left Disoriented. Damage: High Recharge: Slow
Psychic_Shockwave.display_target_help: The Psychic Wail has reduced your attack rate.

Force_Bolt.display_help: Discharges a bolt of force that knocks down foes and deals some Smashing Damage. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast

Power_Blast.display_help: A much more powerful, yet slower version of Power Bolt. Power Blast sends a focused beam of energy at a foe that can knock him back.
Power_Blast.display_target_help: A much more powerful, yet slower version of Power Bolt. Power Blast sends a focused beam of energy at a foe that can knock him back.

Energy_Torrent.display_help: Unleashes a cone of energy that knocks foes back.
Energy_Torrent.display_target_help: Unleashes a cone of energy that knocks foes back.

Power_Burst.display_help: A short range, but devastating attack. Damage: Heavy, Recharge: Slow
Power_Burst.display_target_help: A short range, but devastating attack. Damage: Heavy, Recharge: Slow

Explosive_Blast.display_help: Hurls a blast of charged energy that violently explodes on impact, damaging all foes near the target.
Explosive_Blast.display_target_help: Hurls a blast of charged energy that violently explodes on impact, damaging all foes near the target.

Force_Shield.display_help: Dramatically protects an ally from all attacks for a limited time. Also reduces Toxic damage and protects the target from Endurance Draining effects.
Force_Shield.display_target_help: Dramatically protects an ally from all attacks for a limited time. Also reduces Toxic damage and protects the target from Endurance Draining effects.
Force_Shield.display_attacker_hit: You protect {PlayerDest} from all types of attacks, as well as Toxic Damage and Endurance draining effects with your {PowerName}.
Force_Shield.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} protects you from all types of attacks with a {PowerName} and grants you some resistance to Toxic damage and Endurance draining effects.

Personal_Force_Field.display_help: The Personal Force Field is almost impenetrable to all attacks, even Psionics and Enemy Teleportation, although attacks from more powerful foes may get through more easily. Personal Force Field will also reduce the damage of any attacks that do get through.
Personal_Force_Field.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} makes you virtually invulnerable to most attacks.

Mesmerize.display_help: Mesmerize painfully assails a target with psychic energy, rendering him unconscious. The target will remain asleep for some time, but will awaken if attacked. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Mesmerize.display_target_help: You have been Mesmerized and cannot act.

Levitate.display_target_help: You can send a single target violently into the air, then slam him to the ground for Smashing damage. This power can bring flying foes to the ground. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

Mass_Hypnosis.display_target_help: The Hero has hypnotized you. You are helpless for a while, unless something snaps you out of it.

Psychic_Shockwave.display_target_help: The Psychic Wail has reduced your attack rate.

Personal_Force_Field.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} makes you virtually invulnerable to most attacks.

Jab.display_help: Statesman has Disoriented you with his Jab.
Jab.display_target_help: Statesman has Disoriented you with his Jab.

Punch.display_help: Your Super Strength Punch can deal a moderate amount of damage, but most of all can knock your opponent off his feet, unable to attack again until he stands up. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Punch.display_target_help: Your Super Strength Punch can deal a moderate amount of damage, but most of all can knock your opponent off his feet, unable to attack again until he stands up. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

Haymaker.display_help: A slow but devastating attack, the Haymaker has a great chance of knocking your opponent down. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate
Haymaker.display_target_help: A slow but devastating attack, the Haymaker has a great chance of knocking your opponent down. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

Hand_Clap.display_help: Statesman has Disoriented you with his Hand Clap.
Hand_Clap.display_target_help: Statesman has Disoriented you with his Hand Clap.

Knockout_Blow.display_help: Statesman has hit you with a Knockout Blow. You are Held.
Knockout_Blow.display_target_help: Statesman has hit you with a Knockout Blow. You are Held.

Hurl.display_help: You are able to tear up a chunk of ground beneath your feet and Hurl it at an enemy. This attack is close ranged, deals moderate damage, and can knock foes back. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Hurl.display_target_help: You are able to tear up a chunk of ground beneath your feet and Hurl it at an enemy. This attack is close ranged, deals moderate damage, and can knock foes back. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

Foot_Stomp.display_help: Using your superior leg strength, you can Stomp your foot to the ground, quaking the earth itself. This is a localized attack against everything in melee range. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Foot_Stomp.display_target_help: Using your superior leg strength, you can Stomp your foot to the ground, quaking the earth itself. This is a localized attack against everything in melee range. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

Hammer_of_Justice.display_help: Statesman calls upon the power of the gods to strike down upon you.
Hammer_of_Justice.display_target_help: Statesman calls upon the power of the gods to strike down upon you.

Dull_Pain.display_help: You can activate this power to increase your maximum Hit Points for a short time. Recharge: Very Long
Dull_Pain.display_target_help: You can activate this power to increase your maximum Hit Points for a short time. Recharge: Very Long
Dull_Pain.display_attacker_hit: You {PowerName} and increase your maximum Hit Points.

Unstoppable.display_help: When you activate this power, you not only become extremely resistant to most damage, but also to Disorient, Immobilization, Hold, and Sleep effects. Endurance recovery is also increased. Unstoppable costs little Endurance to activate, but when it wears off you are left exhausted, and drained of almost all Health and Endurance. Recharge: Very Long
Unstoppable.display_short_help: Self, +Res(Disorient, Sleep, Hold, Immobilize, All DMG but Psionics)
Unstoppable.display_target_help: When you activate this power, you not only become extremely resistant to most damage, but also to Disorient, Immobilization, Hold, and Sleep effects. Endurance recovery is also increased. Unstoppable costs little Endurance to activate, but when it wears off you are left exhausted, and drained of almost all Health and Endurance. Recharge: Very Long
Unstoppable.display_target_short_help: Self, +Res(Disorient, Sleep, Hold, Immobilize, All DMG but Psionics)

Zeus_Lightning_Bolt.display_target_help: Statesman can call upon the power of Zeus in time of need.

Zeus_Lightning_Bolt.display_target_help: Statesman can call upon the power of Zeus in time of need.

Charged_Bolts.display_help: The Hero can quickly hurl small bolts of electricity at foes. Charged Bolts deals light damage and also drains some Endurance.
Charged_Bolts.display_target_help: The Hero can quickly hurl small bolts of electricity at foes. Charged Bolts deals light damage and also drains some Endurance.

Lightning_Bolt.display_help: The Hero can send a large blast of electrical energy at a foe. Lightning bolt deals good damage and also drains some Endurance.
Lightning_Bolt.display_target_help: The Hero can send a large blast of electrical energy at a foe. Lightning bolt deals good damage and also drains some Endurance.

Ball_Lightning.display_help: Hurls a highly charged ball of lightning that explodes on contact. Ball Lightning deals good damage in an area and also drains some Endurance from each target it hits.
Ball_Lightning.display_target_help: Hurls a highly charged ball of lightning that explodes on contact. Ball Lightning deals good damage in an area and also drains some Endurance from each target it hits.

Thunderous_Blast.display_help: The Hero's Thunderous Blast has temporarily halted your Endurance Recovery.
Thunderous_Blast.display_target_help: The Hero's Thunderous Blast has temporarily halted your Endurance Recovery.

Havoc_Punch.display_help: You are rendered helpless by the electrical attack. Any form of damage will free you from this state.
Havoc_Punch.display_target_help: You are rendered helpless by the electrical attack. Any form of damage will free you from this state.

Lightning_Clap.display_help: You can clap your hands together to release a violent Lightning Clap. The Lightning Clap can knock down most nearby foes, Disorienting many of them. Lightning Clap deals no damage. Recharge: Slow

Synaptic_Strike.display_help: Unleashes a super fast Flurry of fists and electricity to smash your foe.

Whirlwind.display_help: You spin around at an amazing speed to create a Whirlwind around yourself. Any foes that enter this Whirlwind will be tossed into the air. You must be at least level 20 and have two other Speed Powers before selecting Whirlwind.

Charged_Bolts.display_help: The Hero can quickly hurl small bolts of electricity at foes. Charged Bolts deals light damage and also drains some Endurance.

Thunderous_Blast.display_help: The Hero's Thunderous Blast has temporarily halted your Endurance Recovery.
Thunderous_Blast.display_target_help: The Hero's Thunderous Blast has temporarily halted your Endurance Recovery.
